statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficInformation;
SELECT location_name, traffic_status FROM TrafficInformation WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT road_condition FROM TrafficInformation WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy';
SELECT * FROM TrafficInformation ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM TrafficInformation WHERE traffic_status = 'Heavy Traffic' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, traffic_status, road_condition, weather_condition FROM TrafficInformation WHERE traffic_status = 'Heavy' ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM TrafficInformation WHERE road_condition = 'Wet' OR weather_condition = 'Snowy' ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT location_name, road_condition FROM TrafficInformation WHERE traffic_status = 'Moderate' AND weather_condition = 'Sunny'
SELECT location_name, weather_condition FROM TrafficInformation WHERE location_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND traffic_status = 'Light'
SELECT * FROM TrafficInformation WHERE traffic_status = 'Heavy' OR road_condition = 'Icy' ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions
SELECT condition_description, location FROM traffic_conditions
SELECT * FROM traffic_updates ORDER BY update_time DESC
SELECT location, traffic_level FROM traffic_conditions WHERE traffic_level > 3
SELECT condition_description FROM traffic_conditions WHERE location = 'Downtown'
SELECT condition_description, traffic_level FROM traffic_conditions WHERE location = 'City Center' ORDER BY traffic_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE traffic_level > 3 AND location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY condition_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions tc JOIN traffic_updates tu ON tc.condition_id = tu.condition_id WHERE update_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY update_time DESC;

SELECT tc.condition_description, tu.update_description FROM traffic_conditions tc INNER JOIN traffic_updates tu ON tc.condition_id = tu.condition_id WHERE tc.traffic_level = (SELECT MAX(traffic_level) FROM traffic_conditions);

SELECT update_id, update_time, update_description FROM traffic_updates tu JOIN traffic_conditions tc ON tu.condition_id = tc.condition_id WHERE tc.condition_description LIKE '%accident%' ORDER BY update_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data;
SELECT traffic_id, location, speed FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE traffic_congestion = TRUE;
SELECT route_name, starting_location, ending_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_updates WHERE update_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT traffic_id, update_message, update_timestamp FROM traffic_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE speed > 50
SELECT location, traffic_id FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE traffic_congestion = TRUE
SELECT starting_location, ending_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT traffic_id, update_message FROM traffic_updates WHERE update_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data INNER JOIN routes ON real_time_traffic_data.location = routes.starting_location
SELECT * FROM traffic_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM traffic_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT location_name, incident_type FROM traffic_locations JOIN traffic_incidents ON traffic_locations.id = traffic_incidents.location_id;
SELECT location_name, route_description, route_distance FROM traffic_locations JOIN traffic_routes ON traffic_locations.id = traffic_routes.start_location_id;
SELECT * FROM traffic_locations
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM traffic_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT T.location_name, R.route_description, R.route_distance FROM traffic_locations T JOIN traffic_routes R ON T.id = R.start_location_id WHERE R.route_distance > 50
SELECT I.incident_id, I.incident_type, R.reporter_name, R.report_description FROM traffic_incidents I JOIN traffic_reports R ON I.incident_id = R.incident_id WHERE I.incident_type = 'Accident'

SELECT T.location_name, I.incident_type, R.report_date FROM traffic_locations T JOIN traffic_incidents I ON T.id = I.location_id JOIN traffic_reports R ON I.incident_id = R.incident_id ORDER BY R.report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_information;
SELECT location, traffic_status FROM real_time_traffic_information WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, system_version FROM navigation_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_version FROM mobile_apps WHERE app_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, location FROM user_locations WHERE user_name = 'Alice' AND timestamp <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_information WHERE location='Downtown' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, location FROM user_locations WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT app_name, app_version FROM mobile_apps WHERE app_version LIKE '2.%';
SELECT * FROM navigation_systems WHERE system_version='5.0' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, preference_key FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_value='dark_mode';
